reference.title: Understanding Prose.io markdown language
reference.shortdesc: Prose.io requires you to write your posts in markdown format. This markdown language reference guide lists how to achieve certain specifications.

row.entry: Use hashes (#) to differentiate between various heading sizes. For example: ## will be a larger heading than compared to ####. More hashes will result in smaller headings.

entry.p: Links will require text that you want to serve as the link to be bracketed, ex. [Wikipedia].
Inline link: After bracketed text, follow with parentheses to hold link URL, ex. [Wikipedia](https://www.wikipedia.org)
Reference link: After bracketed text, follow with brackets to hold link URL, ex. [Wikipedia][https://www.wikipedia.org]
Bold: Use two asterisk (**) or two underscores (__).
